value.name: Jury deliberating in homicide trial in 2019 shooting in Erie; self-defense claimed
value.description: He also argued that Erie police took numerous photos of the area ... "Think of all the awful things they said about Jose Arenas, the one man who can't defend himself," Anglin said.

value.name: Video released of officer shooting man reportedly pointing gun at people inside Phoenix restaurant
value.description: Police said around 8 p.m. multiple reports came in of a man, later identified as 26-year-old Jose Arenas, threatening multiple people with a handgun and trying to rob them. Patrol officers from ...

value.name: Videos show man running into Phoenix restaurant ahead of officer-involved shooting
value.description: The officer fired several more shots from close range, hitting Arenas. Police say Jose Arenas point a gun at a family in a vehicle before he ran -- still armed -- into a restaurant full of people.

value.name: Newly released Phoenix Police bodycam shows moments leading up to deadly March 3 shooting
value.description: Police say 26-year old Jose Arenas was threatening people sitting outside in their cars before running inside and threatening to rob people. Several people reported seeing Arenas with a gun ...
